<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For practical purposes, we consider that the use in a PHI</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// occurs in the respective predecessor block. For more info,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><span class="doxyHighlight">        UserBB = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>-&gt;getIncomingBlock(U);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check the current block, as a fast-path, before checking whether</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the use is anywhere in the loop.  Most values are used in the same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block they are defined in.  Also, blocks not reachable from the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UserBB != &amp;BB &amp;&amp; !L.contains(UserBB) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;PHeadBB = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopbase/#ac3280e7f76f955403fe17eacf126b90d">getLoopPreheader</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugloc">DebugLoc</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a> = PHeadBB-&gt;getTerminator()-&gt;getDebugLoc())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop/locrange">LocRange</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we have no pre-header or there are no instructions with debug</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// info in it, try the header.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;HeadBB = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopbase/#a4a75755081e9a3803d2f4ccf6f0cb1f8">getHeader</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop/locrange">LocRange</a>(HeadBB-&gt;getTerminator()-&gt;getDebugLoc());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop/locrange">LocRange</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::string Result;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Just print the module name.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OS &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopbase/#a4a75755081e9a3803d2f4ccf6f0cb1f8">getHeader</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a1b4bf7c97cdc8159fd73d48063f0b250">getParent</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvalue/#a739b30c811f1eece61b05320ddf44e5b">getParent</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module/#a9a4fa55f19f0d5bb47d1fe6802e18d1a">getModuleIdentifier</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Find the new parent loop for all blocks within the &quot;unloop&quot; whose last</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// backedges has just been removed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loopinfo-cpp-/unloopupdater"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loopinfo-cpp-/unloopupdater/#a03b0cd727b4a519b2d54fbb574093abf">UnloopUpdater</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp;Unloop;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="695"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo">LoopInfo</a> &#42;LI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="697"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopblocksdfs">LoopBlocksDFS</a> DFS;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Map unloop&#39;s immediate subloops to their nearest reachable parents. Nested</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loops within these subloops will not change parents. However, an immediate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// subloop&#39;s new parent will be the nearest loop reachable from either its own</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// exits &#42;or&#42; any of its nested loop&#39;s exits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;Loop &#42;, Loop &#42;&gt;</a> SubloopParents;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Flag the presence of an irreducible backedge whose destination is a block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// directly contained by the original unloop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FoundIB = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="720"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="721"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end anonymous namespace</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Update the parent loop for all blocks that are directly contained within the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// original &quot;unloop&quot;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loopinfo-cpp-/unloopupdater/#a45ca996be25c9ad831564c77e37e976c"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loopinfo-cpp-/unloopupdater/#a45ca996be25c9ad831564c77e37e976c">UnloopUpdater::updateBlockParents</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="726"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Unloop.getNumBlocks()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="727"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Perform a post order CFG traversal of all blocks within this loop,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="728"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// propagating the nearest loop from successors to predecessors.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="729"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopblockstraversal">LoopBlocksTraversal</a> Traversal(DFS, LI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="730"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;POI : Traversal) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NL != L) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="736"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For reducible loops, NL is now an ancestor of Unloop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="737"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((NL != &amp;Unloop &amp;&amp; (!NL || NL-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopbase/#a04337b572d34ea413c35dbac5d75530b">contains</a>(&amp;Unloop))) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="738"><span class="doxyHighlight">               </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;uninitialized successor&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="739"><span class="doxyHighlight">        LI-&gt;changeLoopFor(POI, NL);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="740"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="741"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Or the current block is part of a subloop, in which case its parent</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="742"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is unchanged.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="743"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((FoundIB || Unloop.contains(L)) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;uninitialized successor&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="745"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="746"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="747"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Each irreducible loop within the unloop induces a round of iteration using</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the DFS result cached by Traversal.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="749"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> = FoundIB;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NIters = 0; <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a>; ++NIters) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(NIters &lt; Unloop.getNumBlocks() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;runaway iterative algorithm&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="752"><span class="doxyHighlight">    (void)NIters;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="753"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Iterate over the postorder list of blocks, propagating the nearest loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="755"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// from successors to predecessors as before.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopblocksdfs/#abaa6dac694e15144ae94ec68e9761e6a">LoopBlocksDFS::POIterator</a> POI = DFS.beginPostorder(),</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="759"><span class="doxyHighlight">         POI != POE; ++POI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="760"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="761"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;L = LI-&gt;getLoopFor(&#42;POI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="762"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;NL = <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loopinfo-cpp-/unloopupdater/#a764281a8361495e92ef18a100019c9ec">getNearestLoop</a>(&#42;POI, L);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="763"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NL != L) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="764"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(NL != &amp;Unloop &amp;&amp; (!NL || NL-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopbase/#a04337b572d34ea413c35dbac5d75530b">contains</a>(&amp;Unloop)) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="765"><span class="doxyHighlight">               </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;uninitialized successor&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="766"><span class="doxyHighlight">        LI-&gt;changeLoopFor(&#42;POI, NL);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="767"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="768"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="769"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="770"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="771"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="772"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="773"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Remove unloop&#39;s blocks from all ancestors below their new parents.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="774" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loopinfo-cpp-/unloopupdater/#a744753a404df90782bb4e68ac6fb293c"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loopinfo-cpp-/unloopupdater/#a744753a404df90782bb4e68ac6fb293c">UnloopUpdater::removeBlocksFromAncestors</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="808"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Return the nearest parent loop among this block&#39;s successors. If a successor</span></CodeLine>
